:• '''2167''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan., 1024QAM), :• '''1000''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 1024QAM) = '''3100 Mbps class'''
{{TagLine|AC3100 Dual-Band ADSL/VDSL Gigabit Wi-Fi Modem Router}} :{{SupportPage/sandbox|vendor=ASUS|model=DSL-AC88U}} {{see also|ASUS DSL-AC3100|ASUS DSL-AC87VG}} ===Overview=== *'''Ultra-Fast Wi-Fi''' :Features [[Broadcom NitroQAM|NitroQAM]] (1024-QAM) technology to deliver a combined speed :of up to 3167 Mbps for bandwidth-intensive tasks. *'''Future-Proof DSL Compatibility''' :Supports ADSL, ADSL 2/2+, VDSL2, and the latest G.fast broadband connections. *'''Total Flexibility with DSL or Ethernet Internet Connections''' :Has multiple ways to connect to the internet with a choice of DSL for an ADSL/VDSL :connection or an Ethernet port for any fiber or cable-based modems, which makes :it ideal for a future ISP upgrade. ===Additional specifications=== * '''Product segment''': AC3100 (2167+1000 Mbps) * '''Processor''': Broadcom BCM63138 :@1GHz (Dual Core ARM Cortex-A9) * '''Memory''': 128MB NAND Flash/512MB DDR3 RAM * '''Antenna''': 4x detachable antenna (3dBi) :The device has RP-SMA connectors. * '''Ports''': xDSL: 1x xDSL (RJ11) :WAN: 1x GbE (RJ45) 10/100/1000 BaseT :LAN: 4x GbE (RJ45) 10/100/1000 BaseT :USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 * '''Power Adapter''': :AC Input : 100~240V (50/60Hz) :DC Output : 19V / 3.42A *'''Dimensions''' (W x D x H): [[Dimensions::292 mm x 180 mm x 61 mm]] *'''Weight''': [[Weight::795 g]] ===Spec. aggregators=== '''Speedguide'''] ===Reviews=== *[https://www.eteknix.com/asus-dsl-ac88u-ac3100-adslvdsl-modem-router-review ''ASUS DSL-AC88U AC3100 ADSL/VDSL Modem Router'' on '''eTeknix'''] ===Forum threads===
